id.description: A unique identifier for the transaction.

payorId.description: The identifier for the entity making the payment.

payeeId.description: The identifier for the entity receiving the payment.

categoryId.description: The identifier for the category this transaction is associated with. Can be null if not categorized.

amount.description: The monetary value of the transaction.

date.description: The date the transaction took place.

description.description: A textual description of the transaction.

state.description: The current state of the transaction.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the transaction was created.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the transaction was last updated. Nullable to accommodate transactions that have not been updated.
